test.name: Scenario #1

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Replace String
kw.doc: Replaces ``search_for`` in the given ``string`` with ``replace_with``.

kw.name: Replace String
kw.doc: Replaces ``search_for`` in the given ``string`` with ``replace_with``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Replace String
kw.doc: Replaces ``search_for`` in the given ``string`` with ``replace_with``.

kw.name: Wait Element And Get Text
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: ${text} = Raspberry Checkered Print Midi Dress - Blue
${product_name} = Raspberry Checkered Print Midi Dress - Blue

kw.name: Mouse Over
kw.doc: Simulates hovering the mouse over the element ``locator``.
kw.msg: Simulating Mouse Over on element '(//span[text()="Add To Bag"])[1]'.

kw.name: Get Element Attribute
kw.doc: Returns the value of ``attribute`` from the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.arg: select size is out of stock.
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Replace String
kw.doc: Replaces ``search_for`` in the given ``string`` with ``replace_with``.
kw.msg: ${xpath_product_in_bag} = //span[text()="Item added to Bag"]/../..//div[text()="Raspberry Checkered Print Midi Dress - Blue"]

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Log
kw.arg: product was successfull add to the bag.
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: product was successfull add to the bag.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.doc: A customer adds the products any cetegory and click "Cart" Icon
